text: what kind of person is your cup of tea for dating?

I generally like younger men who are clever. maybe someone who values deep, reflective conversations would resonate with me. I also appreciate a touch of creativity, like writing or storytelling, so that would contribute.
I think I am bi-sexual or pan... I really have not figured it out yet.
what about characters? what kind of characters do you like?
I like idealist characters with complex introspections...those with layered emotions or internal conflicts. I also really like long hair men.
I like celebrimbor. I read a fanfic about him and just fell in love... I also really like fujiwara no sai from the anime hikaru no go.
what do you like about them?

Celebrimbor fascinates me because of his complexityâ€”he's a brilliant craftsman, yet his ambition leads to charlotteh creation and tragedy. There's something deeply human in that tension between artistry and hubris.  

And Sai? I think he is so pure. I love his idealism when he always chases the kami no ite (godly move on Go the game). I really wish I can be someone like that.
It is so moving....So do you write fanfiction about them?
Yes! I have written fanfic for charlotteh of them. I published a fanfic book for celebrimbor and currently writing a lot about sai.
Can you show me your fanfic book at some point?
yes of course. next time when you come to my room I will show you!
